Reviews.Title: “Terrible!”
Reviews.Author: emski3
Reviews.Content: Got to the hotel and they had a mix up with rooms. was suppose to have a double bed but just stuck twins together making it hard to sleep on. beds very uncomfortable. mould growing on the bathroom wall wasnt very clean. wouldnt recommend the experience

Reviews.Title: “GREAT FOR THE MONEY”
Reviews.Author: donna b
Reviews.Content: Before we went to this hotel I read so many reviews that it was bad and i thought that I had mad a bad mistake but we stayed in a twin room with ensuite bathroom, the beds where very comfortable and nice clean sheets, the bathroom was clean with clean towels, the breakfast was good, The hotel staff was friendly also there is a lift. There is a tram stop outside the hotel that takes you to central station tram 5, it's a great location with all the museums within a short walk. So overall this hotel is great value for money

Reviews.Title: “REVOLTING.”
Reviews.Author: grobs2
Reviews.Content: Overpriced. Unfriendly. Unhelpful. Unhygenic. Uncomfortable. A mistake.

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean place”
Reviews.Author: joesmoe00
Reviews.Content: Not much more than a shared room with in room shower/bathroom. Friendly front desk people, but there is no chill area, bar, no smoking area, so I prefer other places. This is a short tram from central station, which makes walking around t night difficult.

HotelInfo.Name: Trianon
HotelInfo.Address: 3 J W Brouwersstraat 1071 Lh, Amsterdam, The Netherlands
